#30 #TheCurrentWar - Massively overlooked and underrated, this film charts the race to electrify America in the late 19th Century. With some beautifully shot scenes and a powerhouse performance by #MichaelShannon, this is by no means a dull watch. Watch on @primevideouk https://t.co/46LLrAsccA

#TheCurrentWar #BenedictCumberbatch #MichaelShannon #TomHolland What a great Movie 10/10 . I recommend it . https://t.co/1HMI77ngMy

#TheCurrentWar on #PrimeVideo Fascinating to learn re rivalry b/w Thomas Edison George Westinghouse. Movie heavily focused on -ve side of Edison +ve of Westinghouse. #Tesla's role wasn't covered in detail, which was disappointing. Worth a watch but not up to d expectations.

24) #TheCurrentWar (2019) - The Director¬¥s Cut. I hope it was the DCüòÜ! finally i could watch it and I enjoyed it much more that the one they released before. Ben and M.Shannon are brilliant here. #TheCurrentWar should never have been a movie, rather a 10 episode limited series on @HBO or something. The subject matter is fascinating, the characters compelling and 2 hours isn't near enough time to break the surface. What is there is well done and interesting. 3/5.*
